greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = (k*n)^k, 0 <= k <= n.
link: G. C. Greubel, Rows n=0..100 of triangle, flattened
mathematica: Table[If[n == 0, 1, If[ k == 0, 1, (k*n)^k]], {n, 0, 10}, {k, 0, n}]//Flatten (* _G. C. Greubel_, Sep 15 2018 *)
program: (PARI) for(n=0,10, for(k=0,n, print1((k*n)^k, ", "))) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Sep 15 2018
(MAGMA) [[(n*k)^k: k in [0..n]]: n in [0..10]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Sep 15 2018
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 31 2009
